result.execSummary:
The defendant Samantha K Gregory was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- Sign up for Probation on 10/07/22 by 03:00 PM
- 4 days credit against ultimate sentence

In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

records.addlTxt: e: DA, Atty Dolfi and DOC   c: DE and New Richmond PD   email: Jail
e: DOC arc
DE appeared. DE to pay $25.00/mo comm 12-01-2022. $15 PPF added. DE signed PPA.

11:14 AM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Samantha Kay Gregory in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Samantha Kay Gregory.  Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  ADA Ballo recites joint agreement. Court notes no Information was filed so a PH has not been held.  ADA Ballo files information that will have an amended count 1, removing repeater element.  Atty Dolfi states they'd be willing to waive PH to proceed to PLEAS today. DE sworn. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to AMENDED Ct 1- Retail Theft- Intentionally Take without Repeater in 22CF251.  Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 in 22CF251. On motion of the State without objection, Crt read in and dismisses Ct 2 in 22CF251. Sentencing arguments. 

Court Orders: Amended Ct 1 without repeater

S/W 2 Years Probation

- Court Costs: $268     
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $250
 Apply Bond. Balance to be paid through COC office commencing 12/1/22.

Conditions of Probation:

- 60 days conditional jail- STAYED
- AODA and follow through 
- Cooperate with any other evaluation, assessment and/or program as requested by DOC
- Absolute sobriety
- No Contact with Walmart
- Report to DOC today, 10/7/22 before 3:00 PM. 

4 days credit against ultimate sentence

ADDRESS INFO for Samantha K Gregory
Current: N345 Newman Ave, Spring Valley, WI 54767 United States  (Effective: 09-30-2022)
Prior: 26597 Old 35, Webster, WI 54893 United States
Per SJN. arc

** AMENDED**

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, any Wal-Mart.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:22 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: Christianson, Prosecuting attorney Karl E. Anderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court. Defendant Samantha K Gregory appeared by video, in custody. DE does qualify for PD. Atty Dolfi notes DE did not have a ride to court. DA Anderson makes bond argument. Atty Dolfi notes possible resolution. Court amends bond. Court quashed warrant. Court sets PLEAS. Adjourned 01:25 PM
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.
